directions: Combine olive oil, yogurt, lemon juice, paprika, garlic, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and sugar in a food processor; pulse mixture until smooth. Add a couple feta cubes at a time, processing between batches until mixture until thick and smooth.
Transfer dip to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
1 pound feta cheese, cut into small cubes
title: Spicy Feta Cheese Dip
